guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

Political Compass: (0.5, -0.5) i.e. the centre of the Purple (LibRight) square.

body:
It happened to me at least a few times that I looked for a Save/Bookmark button on Ruqqus.

[This post](https://ruqqus.com/post/14ee/a-categorized-list-of-apolitical-guilds) is a great example.
body_html:
It happened to me at least a few times that I looked for a Save/Bookmark button on Ruqqus.

This post is a great example.

body: Yes, I would love this there is a lot of art that I saved when I was on Reddit to use for future reference. This should definitely be added.

body: I think it should be added, but a hide post/comment feature is more important imo because you can still save permalinks on your own.
body_html: I think it should be added, but a hide post/comment feature is more important imo because you can still save permalinks on your own.

post.title: Thoughts on a post saving feature?

body: Yes please! I hate having a million screenshots of posts on my phone that I never remember to clear out when I could just save them.
body_html: Yes please! I hate having a million screenshots of posts on my phone that I never remember to clear out when I could just save them.
